interpretation: The "COOL button" emoji represents a sense of confidence, nonchalance, and indifference. This card suggests a need to maintain a calm and collected demeanor in the face of challenges or stress. It can also indicate a desire to appear cool and collected on the outside, even if feeling nervous or anxious on the inside. The "COOL button" reminds us to stay composed and keep a level head, especially in situations where emotions may run high. This card can also suggest a need to detach from certain situations or people that may be causing unnecessary drama or stress.
